revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 51:;furthermore orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 7 obols 3, tax on the produce of olives drachma 1 obol 0.5, naubion obols 4.5, surcharges drachmas 2;;eparourion drachmas 7 obols 3, surcharges obols 4, kollybosobols 2, in total drachmas 9 obols 5;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 18 obols 4.5, surcharges drachma 1 obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 19 obols 5.5 chalki 2;;naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year drachma 1 obols 2.5, surcharges obol 1, kollybos chalki 2, in total drachma 1 obol 3.5 chalki 2;;tax far land in release likewise drachma 1 obols 3, surcharges obols 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total drachma 1 obols 5 chalki 2;;grammateia of the phylakites obols 4.5, surcharges obol 0.5, in total obols 5;;furthermore, naubion of katoikoi drachma 1, surcharges obol 0.5 chalki 2, kollybos 2, in total drachma 1 obol 1;;Ptolemaios, son of Sambas, grandson of Sabeinos, mother Aphrodous, drachmas 4;;Sisois, son of Naaraus the younger, grandson of Theabennis, mother Thiasas, drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Onnophris, drachmas 8;;Horos, son of Petheus, grandson of Aunes, mother Eserempis, drachmas 8;;Heras, son of Kelolis, grandson of Heras, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4, copper drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 204 obols 10;;(Pharmouthi) 11 likewise:;Petheus, son of Pasoxis, cultivator of the 1st cleruchy:;orchard taxes for the 12th year at the district of Patsontis, apomoira obols 2, naubion chalki 2, surcharges obol 0.5;;eparourion obol 1.5, surcharges chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, obols 4.5;;geometria for the 12th year drachma 1 chalki 2, surcharges obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachma 1 obols 5;;rent for the 12th year drachmas 7, surcharges obols 3, in total drachmas 7 obols 3;;Phanomgeus, son of Tesenouphis, grandson of Harphaesis, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Horion, son of Kanis, grandson of Anchophis, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;Menches, son of Satabous, grandson of Maron, mother Tkonnos, drachmas 4;;Petheus, son of Kames through the agency of Sisois (Paietis);;(in left margin: drachmas 4 obols 26) orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachma 1 obols 2, tax on the produce of olives obol 1.5, naubion obol 1, surcharges obols 2 chalki 2;;eparourion obols 5.5, surcharges obol 0.5, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 3 obol 1 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 3 obols 2, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 3 chalki 2;;Herakleides, son of Abykis, grandson of Abykis, mother Herais, drachmas 4;;Petaus, son of Petheus, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Stiynchis, drachmas 4;;Segathis, daughter of Onnophris (greengrocer);;naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year obols 3.5, surcharges obol 0.5 chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total obols 4.5;;Heras, son of Petheus, grandson of Heras, mother Didymarion, drachmas 4;;Pakysis, son of Panesneus, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Heras, son of Petsiris, grandson of Heras, mother Isidora, drachmas 4;;Agathopous, slave of Thermouthis alias Tpaiaitios, drachmas 8;;Orsenouphis, son of Heron, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Zoidous, drachmas 4;;Pasoknopaios, son of Petheus, grandson of Pasoknopaios, mother Tepheros, guard-tax, obols 28;;Onnophris, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Taonnophris, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, his son, mother Tapetheus, guard tax, drachmas 4."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
